summary: 10+ years of experience in business analysis, digital marketing, product strategy, project management, and content optimisation. Proven problem-solver on high-impact projects with a focus on driving business improvements through operational efficiency, leading communication initiatives, and helping teams adapt and stay connected and focused in fluid environments.

experience.title: Business Systems Analyst
responsibilities: Leading content production process excellence for a major national website across two major visual and architectural overhauls, with highlights including implementing their first web personalisation program and seeing conversion improvements ranging from 5-38x above baseline in the test.

Launched and facilitated multiple internal training initiatives ranging from a technical onboarding program, effective use of generative AI, Agile 101, a BA centre of excellence, and how to be good at computers.

Responsible primarily for aligning user content/design needs with business requirements and technical restrictions across the digital ecosystem of Australia's most trusted automotive manufacturer, working alongside stakeholders from many client teams and external agencies.

Had exposure to bleeding-edge technical projects including various GenAI projects (LLMs, voice replication, ML vision), and a diverse range of other opportunities for clients from government to agriculture to cosmetics.

experience.title: Subscriptions Marketing Manager
responsibilities: Increased customer conversion rates 2x and increased retention from 40% to 60%, ending a long term decline and exceeding budget forecast for FY16-17.
Successfully implemented significant changes in marketing direction as well as acquisition and retention strategies, based on market research, audience testing, and internal data.

Responsible for commercial and customer success at the head of a small (2-4 person) cross-functional team, working closely with internal and external stakeholders to deliver and execute campaigns while responding to consumer needs.

experience.title: Digital Project Manager
responsibilities: Successfully managed parallel projects despite extremely limited resources, coordinating internal and external stakeholders to ensure delivery timing and specs met or exceeded client expectations.
Optimised content production and reporting processes across different tech stacks for each of up to seven distinct brands, working closely with the product team to aid in gaining efficiencies.

Responsible for production, execution, and reporting on commercial campaign partnerships across all of Private Media's mastheads for products including eBooks, webinars, display ads, solus eDMs, and more.

experience.title: Digital Content Editor
responsibilities: Learning the benefits of combining content production and Agile software development processes, and working directly with the product team in an Agile environment to flag and improve manual workflows.
Coordinating with colleagues across the digital teams to ensure project success in a transitional period.
Responsible for digitising content from Lonely Planet's travel guidebooks in a custom CMS under active development, ensuring content accuracy and suitability for both web and eBook compatibility.
